name: Maimai DX Festival Plus
summary:
The updated version of maimai Deluxe Festival.

General Information / Changes:
- Favorite songs can now be registered on the maimaiでらっくすNET website, and they will appear in a special category in-game.
- Rivals can now be set, in order to challenge other players' high scores.
- Extra area travel distance after reaching the Task Track is now stored.
- When using tickets that increase area travel distance, MASTER and Re:MASTER charts are now playable directly.
- Track skip options are now accessible for the life values that would be seen in a Perfect Challenge (Life 300 down to Life 1).
- New display option in the centre of the screen: DX Score (subtractive type), showing the maximum obtainable DX Score. In addition, when using the Judgement Breakdown display, the number of Critical Perfect is separated from the number of Perfect.
- Note effect volume changes: TOUCH notes are separated into their own category, and the note sound volume for BREAK SLIDE notes can be adjusted too.
- In Invitation Play, ADVANCED charts can now be selected.
- On the splash screen before starting a song, BPM, chart designer name, and current record are now displayed.
- On the last track of a credit, the top light will change it color to red to indicate it is the last track.
